name: sghss-postman
description: Runner para coleção Postman do SGHSS com relatório HTML (htmlextra)

scripts.test:report: newman run SGHSS.postman_collection.json -e SGHSS.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/SGHSS-Runner-Report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "SGHSS Runner Report" --insecure
